original: Kärnan i Hälsingb., priv. å apot. i Sölvesb. sed. 45. Kapten t Norrl. art:reg. res. , Alf Robert, prakt, läkare, Varberg, f. 8/11/02 i Varberg G. 42 m. Margit Stener. Barn: Richard f. 44, Birgitta 46. — Stud:ex. i Gbg 21, med. kand. i St him 25, m^ed. lic. i Lund 35. Auslkultant v. öroinklin. i Lund 35, assist :läk. v. ögonklin. 36, ausikultant v. pediatr. Min. där s. å., v. klin. f. hud-o. könssjukd. i Malmö s. å., proviläk:-förordn. i Alunda distr. tills, två mån. 36 o. 36, förordn. s. stadsläk. i Piteå kort. per. 36, prakt. läk. i Varberg sed. 37. Led. av las :dir. sed. 46. Läk. v. post o. Grimetons radiostat. Skolläk. v. samrealsk. o. v. komm. flicksk. sed. 45.
translated: The core in Hälsingborg, private at the pharmacy in Sölvesborg since 1945. Captain in the Northern Artillery Regiment. Alf Robert, practicing physician in Varberg, born on November 8, 1902 in Varberg. Married in 1942 to Margit Stener. Children: Richard born in 1944, Birgitta born in 1946. Completed student examination in Gothenburg in 1921, medical candidate in Stockholm in 1925, medical licentiate in Lund in 1935. Clinical intern at the ear clinic in Lund in 1935, assistant physician at the eye clinic in 1936, clinical intern at the pediatric department the same year, clinical intern in dermatology and venereology in Malmö in 1936. Temporary medical appointment in the Alunda district for two months in 1936, temporary appointment as city physician in Piteå in early 1936. Practicing physician in Varberg since 1937. Member of the Hospital Board since 1946. Physician at the postal and Grimeton radio station. School physician at the municipal real school and the municipal girls' school since 1945.
